mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (room_no, message_type, user_no, created_at, unread_cnt, message_text) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{type}, #{userNo}, #{createdAt}, #{unreadCnt}, #{text})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_message SET unread_cnt = unread_cnt - 1 WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND message_no > #{lastReadMessageNo}
